rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de las imágenes del corpus
corpus image info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the image component of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de los audios
audio classification info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on audio type/genre of the resource.
Groups information on organization to whomtheperson is affiliated
Ontología para el Catálogo de Recursos Lingüísticos de ReTeLe (http://catalogo.retele.linkeddata.es/) a partir de Metashare.owl (http://purl.org/net/def/metashare)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la codificación de los caracteres
character encoding info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on character encoding of the resource.
Information on the contents of the lexicalConceptualResource as regards the linguistic level of analysis

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los audios del corpus
información de las partes orales del corpus
corpus audio info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the audio module of a corpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del corpus
corpus info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on corpora of all media types.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: video classification info
información de la clasificación de los vídeos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on video genre of the resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de las imágenes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: image classification info
Groups information on the classification of the image corpus.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language variety info
información de las variedades del lenguaje
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on language varieties occurred in the resource (e.g. dialects).
The email address of a person or an organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language info
información de las lenguas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the languages represented in the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource video info
información de los vídeos del recurso léxico conceptual
información audiovisual del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the video part of the lexical conceptual resource.
Groups information on the project that has funded the resource
A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g.LR, document etc.) is located
Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the SizeUnit measurement in form of a number

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: input info
información del recurso de entrada
información de entrada
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the requirements set on the input resource of a tool or service.
Groups together information on character encoding of the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text classification info
información de la clasificación de los textos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on text type/genre of the resource.
Groups information on the text format(s) of a resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información numérica del corpus textual
corpus text numerical info
Groups together information on the textNumerical component of a corpus. It is used basically for the textual representation of measurements and observations linked to sensorimotor recordings.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts
The date in which the creation process was completed

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: documentation
documentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refers to papers, manuals, reports etc. describing the resource
Specifies the type of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource image info
información de las imágenes del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the image part of the lexical/conceptual resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del dominio
domain info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on domains represented in the resource; can be repeated for parts of the resource with distinct domain

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información textual del recurso léxico conceptual
license category
categorización de licencias
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A way of classifying licences according to their conditions of use (CLARIN recommendation)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language description image info
información de las imágenes en las gramáticas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the image module of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.), if there are any (e.g. for sign language grammars).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información oral del recurso léxico conceptual
informacion de las anotaciones
annotation info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the annotated part(s) of a resource.
Groups information on the languages represented in the resource
The short form (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used to identify the resource; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: metadata info
información de los metadatos
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the metadata record itself.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text format info
información de los formatos textuales
información de los formatos del texto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the text format(s) of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: licence info
información de las licencias
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on licences for the resource; can be repeated to allow for different modes of access and restrictions of use (e.g. free for academic use, on-a-fee basis for commercial use, download of a sample for free use etc.)
Groups information on language varieties occurred in the resource (e.g. dialects)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: output info
información del recurso resultante
información del recurso de salida
información de salida
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the requirements set on the output of a tool or service.

Groups information on a person or an organization who holds the full Intellectual Property Rights (Copyright, trademark etc) that subsist in the resource. The IPR holder could be different from the creator that may have assigned the rights to the IPR holder (e.g. an author as a creator assigns her rights to the publisher who is the IPR holder) and the distributor that holds a specific licence (i.e. a permission) to distribute the work within the META-SHARE network.

A person or an organization who holds the full Intellectual Property Rights (Copyright, trademark etc) that subsist in the resource. The IPR holder could be different from the creator that may have assigned the rights to the IPR holder (e.g. an author as a creator assigns her rights to the publisher who is the IPR holder) and the distributor that holds a specific licence (i.e. a permission) to distribute the work via a specific distributor.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codificación de caracteres
character encoding
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información del corpus textual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: corpus text info
Groups together information on the text component of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: persona de contacto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the person(s) that is/are responsible for providing further information regarding the resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de la documentación
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: document info

Groups information on all the documents reporting on various aspects of the resource (creation, usage etc.), published or unpublished; it is used in various places of the metadata schema depending on its role (e.g. usage report, validation report, annotation manual etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los n-gramas del corpus textual
corpus text ngram info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information required for n-gram resources; information can be provided both as regards features drawn from the source corpus (e.g. language coverage, size, format, domains etc.) and features pertaining to the n-gram output itself (e.g. range of n-grams, type of item included, etc.).
The date in which the creation process was started
Groups together information on domains represented in the resource; can be repeated for parts of the resource with distinct domain
Groups together information on text type/genre of the resource
Specifies the writing system used to represent the language in form of a four letter code as it is defined in ISO-15924

The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (http://www.iana.org/)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: language description info
información de las gramáticas
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on language descriptions (grammars).
The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service
The type of the language description

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource info
información del recurso léxico conceptual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Groups together information specific to lexical/conceptual resources.
Indicates whether the resource includes one, two or more languages
The name of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service

A human understandable name of the language that is used in the resource or supported by the tool/service; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)
Specifies the application domain of the resource or the tool/service
A more detailed account of the linguistic information contained in the lexicalConceptualResource

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: actor
actor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to bring persons and organizations (in whatever role they may have with regard to the resource, e.g., resource creator, IPR holder, etc.)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: información de los vídeos del corpus
Corpus video info
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: información de los componentes audivisuales del corpus
Groups together information on the video component of a corpus.
